replies.author: zacanbrcom

replies.bodyText:
I tested on my che with devfile based with this lsp and I haven't seen the dep file deleted at didOpen
Moreover when I try to change the copybook name, the dep file still maintain the old value.

I experienced the same issue because CHE doesn't close the file immediately and moreover we got a problem on VSCode with Zowe: "if your file is open by Zowe explorer and you close it and open it again you will see the same problem because I think that the IDE does not close the file immediately"
replies.author: sergiuilie

timeline.body: It is definitely not the responsibility of this class. I think that `TextDocumentService` should just fire an event to make `CopybookService` to remove the dep file
timeline.bodyText: It is definitely not the responsibility of this class. I think that TextDocumentService should just fire an event to make CopybookService to remove the dep file
timeline.bodyHTML: It is definitely not the responsibility of this class. I think that TextDocumentService should just fire an event to make CopybookService to remove the dep file
timeline.author: temanbrcom

replies.bodyText: Wait, CopybookService lose this responsability, there is a CopybookDependencyService that is responsible to everything is related to the dep file. Why we need to propagate this event on the databus?
replies.author: zacanbrcom

replies.bodyText:
Yes, it should be on CopybookDependencyService.
The databus event is needed to remove a direct dependency between the TextDocumentService and the dependency service.
replies.author: temanbrcom

replies.bodyText: There is no direct dependency between those two services, @temanbrcom , how do you see the dependency?
replies.author: sergiuilie

replies.bodyText: There is no dependency because now TextDocumentService is applying file operations, but it shouldn't. It should just notify the CopybookDependencyService to delete dep files
replies.author: temanbrcom

replies.bodyText: So, there is no dependency, I will take a look and see how I can notify the CopybookDependencyService
replies.author: sergiuilie

replies.bodyText: To be clear - saying "remove" I meant "avoid"
replies.author: temanbrcom

replies.bodyText: Yes, the correct line should be if (!updatedLines.equals(result)). The reason is that Collectors#toList() creates a new list every time, so the check on a link inequity will always return true

timeline.body: It seems like we may call a `CopybookDependencyServiceImpl#obaserverCallback()` method directly, so we don't need a data bus broker and asynchronous awaiting.

replies.bodyText: I agree if we have an "integration test" that use databus between DependencyService and CopybookService

replies.bodyText: In fact, the integration that should be asserted in this class is only a subscription to the data bus in the constructor, because we may rely on more specific data bus tests.

timeline.body: `Paths.get` cannot return `null, so this check won't work. It is better to use `Files::exists` here
